definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: I let the plane down gently, pulled off the runway, and taxied back to parking.
sentences.chinese: 我稳稳地降落了飞机，驶离跑道，滑行回了停机场。

sentences.english: The AWACS detection effectiveness cruising along racetrack is researched.
sentences.chinese: 对预警机跑道形巡航时的探测效能问题进行了研究。

sentences.english: About the plane from the ground, the McCarran ignited the gasoline floating down the runway.
sentences.chinese: 在飞机即将离地时，麦卡伦点燃了跑道上洒落的汽油。

sentences.english: There is a camp ground near the run ways.
sentences.chinese: 在机场跑道附近有一个野营地。

sentences.english: Denver international airport currently has the most runways in the world with six.
sentences.chinese: 目前丹佛国际机场拥有6条跑道，是世界上最多的。

sentences.english: No one fainted at the sight of the aircraft being trafficked onto the runway.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个人因为看到飞机在跑道上交易时而昏厥。

sentences.english: Male models can use fade turns in combination to create a stunning runway walk.
sentences.chinese: 男模特可以使用淡入组合来创造一个惊人的跑道走。

sentences.english: Voyager began to move down the runway, slowly.
sentences.chinese: “航行者”号慢慢的沿跑道加速。

sentences.english: Get into a car with your partner and drive around the track for a bit.
sentences.chinese: 和你的伙伴一起上车并在跑道上试开一下。

sentences.english: Touching down on the runway is a Concorde supersonic jet.
sentences.chinese: 一架协和式超音速客机正降落在跑道上。

sentences.english: Please have your customs declaration form ready.
sentences.chinese: 一条牛在跑道上，请做好准备，有需要就复飞。

sentences.english: Obstruction on the R/W, pull up and go around.
sentences.chinese: 跑道上有障碍物，拉升复飞。

sentences.english: Switch off your engine and park on the runway, we will send a tractor to pull you back.
sentences.chinese: 关车，停在跑道上，我们将派一辆牵引车拖你回来。

sentences.english: The cow is still on the runway, go around again.
sentences.chinese: 牛仍在跑道上，再复飞一圈。

sentences.english: The synthetic-rubber track can be used in all weathers on condition that the drainage facilities are good.
sentences.chinese: 塑胶跑道在排水设施完善的条件下，可供全天候使用。

sentences.english: A running track should be capable of absorbing the impact of a runner's foot landing on it.
sentences.chinese: 跑道应该能够吸收奔跑者踩踏地面时产生的撞击力。

definition: (of aircraft) to take off and land
the rear (tail) of a plane etc
